title: The moveable horizontal stabilizer is attached to the vertic…
caption_en: The moveable horizontal stabilizer is attached to the vertical fin at the forward and aft attachment points. The aft point iis the pivot and the forward point is attached to the horizontal stabilizer actuator. The position of the stabilizer is controlled through 2 pitch trim systems, the primary and the secondary trim systems. pr epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The pitch trim system relieves control column (elevator) loa…
caption_en: The pitch trim system relieves control column (elevator) loads by moving the horizontal stabilizer. Two trim motors, primary (PRI) and secondary (SEC), and a jackscrew actuator moves the leading edge of the stabilizer up or down in response to pitch trim inputs. po epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Pitch Trim Selector Switch This 3 - position switch is locat…
caption_en: Pitch Trim Selector Switch This 3 - position switch is located on the center pedestal. The 3 positions are labeled PRI, OFF and SEC. It allows the crew to select either primary or secondary trim operation or to switch off both systems in the event of a matfunction. po epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The system is powered through the PRI PITCH circuit breaker.…
caption_en: The system is powered through the PRI PITCH circuit breaker. prone epi mov see own ug am Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: An advisory CAS message SEC PITCH TRIM is also displayed. Th…
caption_en: An advisory CAS message SEC PITCH TRIM is also displayed. The system is powered through the SEC PITCH circuit breaker. When selected, the is deactivated. iar epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Seer sen vm mg wp wri
caption_en: Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The crew can also disable both primary and secondary trim by…
caption_en: The crew can also disable both primary and secondary trim by depressing and holding the control wheel master switch or by pulling the PRI PITCH or SEC PITCH circuit breaker. JE epi mov see own ug am Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Trim Motors The 2 trim motors, primary (PRI) and secondary (…
caption_en: Trim Motors The 2 trim motors, primary (PRI) and secondary (SEC) are electrically controlled and operated. Only 1 motor clutch can engage at any one time and this depends on the trim selector switch position or auto-pilot engagement. pone epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The primary motor is engaged with the trim selector switch a…
caption_en: The primary motor is engaged with the trim selector switch at PRI and actuated through the control wheel trim switch Its operation is normally controlled by the 1 IC-600. pone epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The secondary motor operation is provided as a back-up for t…
caption_en: The secondary motor operation is provided as a back-up for the the trim system. It is engaged with the trim selector switch at SEC and is controlled through the airplane secondary pitch trim switch (crew actuated). The auto-pilot trim system also uses this motor. Ge epi mov see own ug am Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Both the trim motors continuously monitor trim operations fo…
caption_en: Both the trim motors continuously monitor trim operations for a number of possible malfunctions. This includes uncommanded trim, incorrect trim rate and trimming in the wrong direction. If any of these faults is detected, the trim motor operation stops. en epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The 1 I1C-600 is activated with the trim selector at PRI. lt…
caption_en: The 1 I1C-600 is activated with the trim selector at PRI. lt receives trim signals from the and commands the PRI motor to move the stabilizer. It also controls and trims the airplane for the Configuration trim and the Mach trim systems. Ge epi mov see own ug am Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The 2 IC-600 houses the control and monitor circuits for aut…
caption_en: The 2 IC-600 houses the control and monitor circuits for auto-pilot operations. it controls the operation of the secondary trim motor with auto-pilot engaged. For auto-pilot operations, the trim selector switch can be at either the PRI or SEC position. Ge epi mov see own ug am Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Both the 1 and 2 IC-600 continuously monitor themselves for …
caption_en: Both the 1 and 2 IC-600 continuously monitor themselves for a number of possible malfunctions. This includes uncommanded trim commands, incorrect trim rate and trimming in the wrong direction. If any of these fauits is detected, trimming through them is disabled. LG wn epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The Primary pitch trim system uses the 1 and the primary or …
caption_en: The Primary pitch trim system uses the 1 and the primary or PRI motor. The Secondary pitch trim system uses the secondary or SEC motor only. The auto-pilot system uses the 2 and the secondary or SEC motor. We will begin with the primary pitch trim system. erm epi mov see own ug am Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Primary Manual Pitch Trim System The PRI motor is engaged wi…
caption_en: Primary Manual Pitch Trim System The PRI motor is engaged with the pitch trim selector switch at PRI position. This enables the L ESS Bus to power both the control wheel trim switches through the PRI PITCH TRIM circuit breaker. Moving either forward or aft sends pitch signals to the 1 pr epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The 1 IC-600 then sends primary trim commands to the primary…
caption_en: The 1 IC-600 then sends primary trim commands to the primary trim motor. The primary trim motor also sends feedback signals to the 1 for position indications. Primary trim speed is variable and is automatically controlled by the 1 IC-600 based on indicated airspeed or dynamic pressure (q). po epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Configuration Trim The 1 receives spoiler information from t…
caption_en: Configuration Trim The 1 receives spoiler information from the DAUSs for configuration trim. When the spoilers are deployed, the 1 IC-600 commands the primary trim motor to move the stabilizer a preset amount to account for the change in pitch attitude. po epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The stabilizer moves at a rate to match the pitch moment cau…
caption_en: The stabilizer moves at a rate to match the pitch moment caused by the movement of the spoilers. This trim mode is only available with the trim selector switch in PRI and the auto-pilot is not engaged. Trim commands from either will have priority over the configuration trim commands. prone epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Mach Trim Mach trim is a fully automated system to increase …
caption_en: Mach Trim Mach trim is a fully automated system to increase longitudinal stability and to counteract a nose down tendency (Mach tuck) at high mach numbers. iar epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The 1 IC-600 uses the airspeed information from the 2 ADCs t…
caption_en: The 1 IC-600 uses the airspeed information from the 2 ADCs to compute and commands the primary trim motor to apply trim as necessary. The pitch trim selector switch must be at PRI for the Mach trim to be functional and the auto-pilot must be disengaged for the Mach trim system to be active. po epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Mach trim automatically becomes active at mach. Airplane nos…
caption_en: Mach trim automatically becomes active at mach. Airplane nose up trim will be applied as mach increases and nose down trim as mach decreases. When the stabilizer position changes, mach trim sensors apply feedback signals to the 1 Mach trim is interrupted whenever the manual trim is activated. JE epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Mach trim system function, and the - the airspeed is below M…
caption_en: Mach trim system function, and the - the airspeed is below Mach, - an advisory CAS message MACH TRIM FAIL will be displayed. pone epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: When the advisory CAS message MACH TRIM FAIL is displayed, t…
caption_en: When the advisory CAS message MACH TRIM FAIL is displayed, the Overspeed cue on the airspeed indicator will also be adjusted to indicate a mach limit of Mach. pone epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Mach trim system function, and the - the airspeed is above M…
caption_en: Mach trim system function, and the - the airspeed is above Mach, - a caution CAS message MACH TRIM FAIL will be displayed instead. Ge epi mov see own ug am Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The primary trim system automatically reverts to the primary…
caption_en: The primary trim system automatically reverts to the primary bypass trim mode. en epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: In this primary bypass mode, the commands go directly to the…
caption_en: In this primary bypass mode, the commands go directly to the primary trim motor, bypassing the 1 IC-600 circuits. All the 1 trim functions including 1 IC-600 controlledmonitored primary trim, configuration trim and Mach trim systems will not be available. Ge epi mov see own ug am Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: When operating in the primary bypass trim mode, the primary …
caption_en: When operating in the primary bypass trim mode, the primary trim motor operates at only 2 speeds - high or iow. The speed depends on the flap positions. Both left and right flap signals must indicate flaps greater than 3 for the motor to operate at a high rate. When the flaps are up ( the primary bypass trim will be at a slow rate. Ge epi mov see own ug am Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: In this primary bypass mode, the primary trim motor continue…
caption_en: In this primary bypass mode, the primary trim motor continues to monitor for uncommanded trim and incorrect trim direction. it also monitors the correct trim rate based on the flaps position. LG wn epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: We will now use the secondary trim system to trim the stabil…
caption_en: We will now use the secondary trim system to trim the stabilizer. erm epi mov see own ug am Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Secondary Pitch Trim The secondary pitch trim system can be …
caption_en: Secondary Pitch Trim The secondary pitch trim system can be selected anytime but is normally used to trim the airplane in the eventof a primary trim system failure. In this trim mode, the configuration trim and the Mach trim systems are not available. pr epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The SEC motor is engaged with the trim selector switch at SE…
caption_en: The SEC motor is engaged with the trim selector switch at SEC position. With SEC selected, an advisory CAS message SEC PITCH TRIM is displayed. This also enables the R ESS Bus to power the 2 segment SEC trim switch via the SEC PITCH TRIM circuit breaker. por epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Moving both the segments simultaneously sends a pitch signal…
caption_en: Moving both the segments simultaneously sends a pitch signal directly to the secondary motor. The secondary motor then moves the stabilizer accordingly. The stabilizer position feedback signals are sent back to the 2 for stabilizer trim indications. po epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The secondary pitch trim motor has monitor functions similar…
caption_en: The secondary pitch trim motor has monitor functions similar to the primary motor. it performs a power-up check and if any faults are detected, an advisory CAS message SEC TRIM FAULT is displayed. However, the secondary trim system still operates normally. ro epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The secondary pitch trim motor also monitors for uncommanded…
caption_en: The secondary pitch trim motor also monitors for uncommanded trim, trim in wrong direction and incorrect trim rate. If any of these malfunctions is detected, a caution CAS message SEC TRIM FAIL is displayed and the secondary motor is disabled. pe epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Auto-pilot Pitch Trim The 2 IC-600 houses the control and mo…
caption_en: Auto-pilot Pitch Trim The 2 IC-600 houses the control and monitor circuit for auto-pilot operation. For auto-pilot pitch trim control, the trim selector switch can be at either PRI or SEC. The auto-pilot trims the stabilizer through the SEC motor. pr epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: When the auto-pilot is engaged, it controls the airplane pit…
caption_en: When the auto-pilot is engaged, it controls the airplane pitch attitude using the pitch servo and the secondary trim motor. When the auto-pilot energizes the secondary trim motor for more than 3 seconds continuously, a series of audible clacker sounds is transmitted through the audio system. por epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Unusually long periods of auto-piiot trimming may indicate a…
caption_en: Unusually long periods of auto-piiot trimming may indicate a trim runaway. The trim-in-motion clacker works only for auto-pilot trimming. po epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Even during auto-pilot operations, the 2 IC-600 continually …
caption_en: Even during auto-pilot operations, the 2 IC-600 continually monitors for uncommanded trim, incorrect trim direction and incorrect trim rate. If either trim switch or SEC trim) is activated with the auto-pilot engaged, the auto-pilot will automatically disengaged. ro epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The secondary motor also monitors for un-commanded trim and …
caption_en: The secondary motor also monitors for un-commanded trim and wrong trim direction. if the secondary motor detects either fault during the auto-pilot operation, a caution CAS message SEC TRIM FAIL is displayed and the secondary motor is disabled. This means that auto-pilot pitch trim function is not available anymore. pe epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The stabilizer pitch trim indications are shown on -the SUMR…
caption_en: The stabilizer pitch trim indications are shown on -the SUMRY page as 0 to 10 (digital format) -the EICAS - page in digital format and also in an analog and pointer format -the RMU page 2 in a digital format pegs epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: The stabilizer takeoff trim band is between and units. The t…
caption_en: The stabilizer takeoff trim band is between and units. The trim setting for the stabilizer must be within this white takeoff band for takeoff. if the trim is out of the band for take-off, the pitch trim unit will be boxed and an advisory CAS message TAKE OFF TRIM is displayed. po epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri

title: Advancing the throtties beyond will cause the take-off warni…
caption_en: Advancing the throtties beyond will cause the take-off warnings to be activated. The advisory CAS message TAKE OFF TRIM and all the pitch trim indications will tum red. The aural CONFIGURATION voice warning will also sound. por epi mov see own ug aa Seer sen vm mg wp wri
